content: /poll How often are your published data refreshed?
For Epic sandbox and our customers, the default is 5 minutes, but organizations can choose to override that default. I don't expect many organizations will choose to override the default, however.
This is configurable for organizations but it looks like the default is 5 minutes.
can we run this poll again? or does anyone here know the frequency that different publishers are updating?
/poll How often are your published data refreshed?
@Cooper Thompson @Ryan Owens @Hemalatha Ravishankar and others, if you don't mind sharing your (updated or same) answers
We are dynamic at USDR, but I didn't fill in the poll since we’re an aggregator and not first-party. (Let me know if you’d like me to click the button on the poll, though!)
Oh go ahead and click ;-) Folks who want context can read on.

Kroger is initially targeting updating the data about every 15 minutes. Longer term, we plan to move to more dynamic and updating individual store data in response to events. We do not have a timeline for delivering the event-driven approach.
